title: Advanced Product Search with Filters
description: As a customer, I want to search for products with filters so that I can quickly find items that meet my specific needs and preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Search bar is prominent on all pages
Search supports keyword, product name, SKU, category
Auto-complete suggestions appear as user types
Filters include: price range, category, brand, rating, availability
Search results update dynamically when filters are applied
User can sort results by: relevance, price, rating, newest
Search handles typos and suggests corrections
No results page suggests alternative searches or popular products

comments.author: Backend Developer
comments.text: Using Elasticsearch for search. Implemented fuzzy matching and synonym support.

comments.author: Performance Engineer
comments.text: Search performance optimized. Average response time: 250ms.
